code: import axios from"axios";import{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import Form from"./components/Form";import Results from"./components/Results";import Title from"./components/Title";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[city,setCity]=useState();const[results,setResults]=useState({country:"",cityName:"",temperature:"",conditionText:"",icon:""});const getWeather=e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.get("https://api.weatherapi.com/v1/current.json?key=dec1f80e9c2c41ff81e102253240904&q=".concat(city,"&aqi=no")).then(res=>{setResults({country:res.data.location.country,cityName:res.data.location.name,temperature:res.data.current.temp_c,conditionText:res.data.current.condition.text,icon:res.data.current.condition.icon});});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{cityName:city}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{setCity:setCity,getWeather:getWeather}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Results,{results:results})]})});}export default App;
